name: Army Gun Shoot 2
description:
Army Fast Gun Shoot is most Expensive First person aiming and shooting Game.This is most thrilling and action game of fury counter sniper game. Hold your breath and be ready to pull trigger in the most addictive playable incredible thrilling game with commando sniper assassin and moment to moment changing the terrorist and brutal enemy FPS with guns shooting latest technology armor in their hand with more than multiple real life missions to eradicate assault war.
FEATURES…
Modern Assassin Weapons
Different Types of challenging Levels
Collecting Gold’s coins to buy the guns
Different Weapons collection
Realistic Vehicles real shooting and stealth animation
Fantastic Arms at your disposal in battle
